sentence: According to Politico, "Mehmet Oz, the celebrity doctor and television host who launched his campaign Nov. 30, has spent $5.4 million on advertisements in less than two months," while former hedge fund CEO David McCormick, "has dropped $3.7 million on ads."
author: Grayson Quay
title: Millionaire candidates make massive ad buys in Pennsylvania's GOP Senate primary

sentence: In the Republican field, TV personality Dr. Mehmet Oz has raised $5.7 million, having donated more than $5 million of his own money to his campaign.
author: Dave Boyer
title: Pa. Democrats had vote-counting snag in attempt to endorse Senate candidate

sentence: Among the Republicans vying to replace Senator Pat Toomey, who is retiring, are several with ties to the former president: Carla Sands, his former ambassador to Denmark; his friend the celebrity doctor Mehmet Oz; and hedge fund CEO David McCormick, whose wife served in the Trump administration.
author: Jarrett Renshaw
title: With Trump silent, Pennsylvania Republicans decide against endorsing in Senate race

sentence: TV personality Dr. Mehmet Oz leads the field for the Republican nomination for Pennsylvania’s U.S. Senate seat, but a large swath of GOP voters is undecided, according to a poll released Monday.
author: Dave Boyer
title: Pa. poll finds Dr. Oz leading with GOP voters, but many still undecided in Senate race

author: STEVE PEOPLES
title: 'The brand is so toxic': Democrats fear extinction in rural America

sentence: Republicans have a wide-open field, featuring three wealthy and well-connected transplants from out of state — including Mehmet Oz, host of daytime TV’s “The Dr. Oz Show” — who are spending millions of dollars on TV ads.

title: ‘We want to win’: Democrats face choice in key Senate race

sentence: Republicans have a wide-open field, including three wealthy and well-connected transplants from out of state — including Mehmet Oz, host of daytime TV’s “The Dr. Oz Show” — who are spending millions of dollars on TV ads.
author: Associated Press
title: 'We want to win': Democrats face choice in key Senate race in Pennsylvania

sentence: Parnell’s exit threw open the doors to McCormick and Mehmet Oz, the celebrity heart surgeon best known as daytime TV’s host of “The Dr. Oz Show,” and accelerated spending in what could be this year’s most expensive Senate race.

title: Ex-hedge fund CEO aims to be hometown boy in key Senate race

sentence: He called out Republican Senate candidate Mehmet Oz, former host of the “Dr.

title: Democratic Senate candidates square off in political forum at CMU

sentence: It found Fetterman initially leading celebrity doctor Mehmet Oz by 9 percentage points, while Lamb was ahead by 3.
title: Super PAC signals Pennsylvania primary could get rough

sentence: While delivering a private speech as part of his “American Freedom” tour in Florida this weekend, Trump asked the crowd what they thought about GOP candidate Mehmet Oz.
author: Jason Easley
title: Trump Is Hinting At Meddling And Handing The Pennsylvania Senate Seat To Democrats By Supporting Dr. Oz

sentence: To make matters worse, a poll recently commissioned by Lamb’s own super PAC showed his main Democratic opponent—John Fetterman—not just beating him in a primary where the more liberal candidate often has more traction; polling showed Fetterman as the better candidate in a general election, against potential GOP nominees like Dr. Mehmet Oz.
author: Ursula Perano
title: Will Fetterman Silence Lamb in Pennsylvania Senate Face-Off?

sentence: On the Republican side, Dr. Mehmet Oz, who became famous as a health guru on Oprah Winfrey’s show, is running against about a trillion other hopefuls.
title: ‘You Don’t Know Squat!’ and Other Signs of Our High-Minded Politics

sentence: "To make matters worse, a poll recently commissioned by Lamb’s own super PAC showed his main Democratic opponent — John Fetterman — not just beating him in a primary where the more liberal candidate often has more traction; polling showed Fetterman as the better candidate in a general election, against potential GOP nominees like Dr. Mehmet Oz."
author: Matthew Chapman
title: Biden-snubbed Conor Lamb says 'the race is wide open' for Pennsylvania Senate — but is that what the numbers say?

sentence: The crowded Republican primary includes former hedge fund executive David McCormick and television personality Dr. Mehmet Oz.
author: Dave Boyer
title: Front-runner John Fetterman skips Pennsylvania Senate debate while rivals attack

sentence: Former U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday said he is endorsing celebrity surgeon Dr. Mehmet Oz, who is running as a Republican in a closely watched U.S. Senate contest in Pennsylvania.

title: Trump Endorses Celebrity Surgeon Dr. Oz For U.S. Senate Seat In Pennsylvania

sentence: Article content WASHINGTON — Former U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday said he is endorsing celebrity surgeon Dr. Mehmet Oz, who is running as a Republican in a closely watched U.S. Senate contest in Pennsylvania.
title: Trump endorses Dr. Oz for U.S. Senate seat in Pennsylvania

sentence: Article content WASHINGTON — Former U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday said he is endorsing celebrity surgeon Dr. Mehmet Oz, who is running as a Republican in a closely watched U.S. Senate contest in Pennsylvania.
title: Trump endorses celebrity surgeon Dr. Oz for U.S. Senate seat in Pennsylvania

sentence: "The Great Commonwealth of Pennsylvania has a tremendous opportunity to Save America by electing the brilliant and well-known Dr. Mehmet Oz for the United States Senate," Trump said in a statement announcing the endorsement.
author: Chris Cillizza
title: The ridiculous price tag for a Senate race

sentence: “The Great Commonwealth of Pennsylvania has a tremendous opportunity to Save America by electing the brilliant and well-known Dr. Mehmet Oz for the United States Senate.” Trump’s endorsement touted Oz’s books and television show, and said that “women, in particular, are drawn to Dr. Oz for his advice and counsel”—portraying this quality as one that would help Oz win the election.
author: Paul Blest
title: Trump Endorsed Dr. Oz and Republicans Are Pissed

sentence: The Republican primary is a tighter race with Dr. Mehmet Oz and David McCormick more or less tied, although Oz has more support among the “Trump faction of the party,” which is all that’s left of the GOP.

title: PA Senate Candidate John Fetterman Leading Race To Convince Voters He’s Better Than Dr. Oz

sentence: On the GOP side, Dr. Mehmet Oz is leading in the polls.
